title: Bristol

content:
Commercial officers training event

2 Feb 16, 17 people

Feedback 73% Good or Very good

5 presentations

> Thank you so much for the training event you hosted for us last week. I found the presentations very interesting and they gave me a great overview of the role and future plans for our department. It was also great to meet with others in a similar situation to me. Id be very keen to be involved in future events so please let me know what youre planning.

- MJ Broadbent

> I manage 3 commercial officers and they have all fed back to me that the training was excellent. I have another 2 who I will be encouraging strongly to participate in future events.
title: Collab

title: Collab

content:
Development - want to lead a team or group with strategic roadmap setting responsibilities. Have exp in leading groups, strategy writing, comms, mentoring. Seen a similar role discussed but want to know how to position myself to be a contender. Talk to Alexis? 

Relevant for Leading and communicating, Achieving commercial outcomes, Changing and improving. 

Experience with KPMG / Accenture might be an advantage. Refresh contacts, attend networking event on 14 April.
title: Places to EAT
